external_games.name: Koi no Tsuzuki wa Honeymoon de

name: Koi no Tsuzuki wa Honeymoon de
storyline:
Love and a speedy marriage with your man through an encounter with destiny.
It was suppose to be a happy honeymoon but for some reason, there have been continuous mishaps at your honeymoon destination! There a dark shadow appears, trying to spilt the two of you apart.

Will you two be able to overcome this threat and keep your marriage safe?
summary: A Visual novel by Voltage Inc.
